verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Like a river glorious Is God’s perfect peace, Over all victorious, In its bright increase; Perfect, yet it floweth Fuller every day, Perfect, yet it groweth Deeper all the way.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Stayed upon Jehovah, Hearts are fully blest; Finding, as He promised, Perfect peace and rest.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Hidden in the hollow Of His blessed hand, Never foe can follow, Never traitor stand; Not a surge of worry, Not a shade of care, Not a blast of hurry Touch the spirit there.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Every joy or trial Falleth from above, Traced upon our dial By the Sun of Love. We may trust Him fully All for us to do; They who trust Him wholly Find Him wholly true.
